rows.label: xs07030100_MSG0001
rows.name:
A request for backup?
Iriina's team?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs07030100_MSG0004
rows.name:
Actually a Life Point was found in
the Valley of Oblivion.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs07030100_MSG0005
rows.name: Huh? A Life Point was found?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs07030100_MSG0007
rows.name:
I asked Iriina's team.
It wasn't the main one.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs07030100_MSG0008
rows.name: But it is in nearly perfect condition[ST:wide ]â€•[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs07030100_MSG0011
rows.name: What happened to Iriina-san and her team?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs07030100_MSG0012
rows.name: Apparently there was a Growth base nearby.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs07030100_MSG0013
rows.name:
I see. So a large Growth force appeared from there
and attacked Iriina's team.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs07030100_MSG0015
rows.name:
We're wasting time.
We'll leave immediately.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs07030100_MSG0016
rows.name: Put the details up on FrontierNet.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs07030100_MSG0017
rows.name: It's already become available for download.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs07030100_MSG0018
rows.name: Transferring to all team members' [System:Ruby rt=Devices ]terminals[/System:Ruby].[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs07030100_MSG0020
rows.name:
The operational time is decreasing,
we can't afford to lose valuable personnel.[ST:wait ]
